# rafay_cloud_credential (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_cloud_credential" "credential" {
  name         = "testinggcp2"
  projectname  = "dev3"
  description  = "description"
  providertype = "<AWS/GCP/MINIO>"
  rolearn      = ""
  credtype     = "access"
  rolearn      = ""
  externalid   = ""
  accesskey    = ""
  secretkey    = ""
  credfile     = "<filepath/cred.json>"
}
```
